thread.title: Trump threatens to tax European auto imports

title: Trump threatens to tax European auto imports
text:
Trump escalates tariff tiff, threatening to tax Euro auto imports 3:34am IST - 01:42 
U.S. President Donald Trump kept up pressure on trading partners on Saturday, threatening European automakers with a tax on imports if the European Union retaliates against his plan to slap tariffs on aluminum and steel.   
U.S. President Donald Trump kept up pressure on trading partners on Saturday, threatening European automakers with a tax on imports if the European Union retaliates against his plan to slap tariffs on aluminum and steel.  //reut.rs/2I31ncw
